dict.acceptation: 母亲，妈妈；女修道院院长；大娘；
像母亲般地照顾；养育；溺爱；

sent.orig: In the word "mother" the stress is on the first syllable.
sent.trans: 在"mother"这一字里，重音在第一个音节上。

sent.orig: Hair is born out of one's mother and it becomes the memory of mother.
sent.trans: 头发是对于母的记忆，在头发的记忆中父亲是缺席的。

sent.orig: She gave her mother the tickets/gave the tickets to her mother to look after.
I am a capable wife and mother, but I am not schedule myself wife mother!
sent.trans: 结婚，是因为喜欢一个人并且愿意一起分享喜乐，不是人生的任务，更没有时间表！

sent.orig: He always stays with his mother wherever his mother goes.
sent.trans: 无论他妈妈走到哪儿，他总是跟在她的屁股后面。
